abstract: Many have praised Representative Paul Ryan’s deficit reduction plan for its boldness. But in some areas — like, well, details– it might be a little meek.

lead_paragraph: Many have praised Representative Paul Ryan’s deficit reduction plan for being bold and dangerous. But in some areas — like, well, details — it might be a little meek.

headline.main: Getting from A to B on Deficit Reduction
